instruction: How can I download the Wells Fargo mobile app?
output: There are three ways to get the Wells Fargo Mobile® app: 1) Scan the QR code with your phone's camera, 2) Text 'IPH' for Apple or 'AND' for Android to 93557 to receive a download link, or 3) Visit your device's app store directly. Message and data rates may apply when texting.

instruction: Can I deposit checks using my phone?
output: Yes, you can deposit checks using the Wells Fargo Mobile® app. Mobile deposit allows you to deposit checks on the go in a fast, easy, and secure way. Please note that mobile deposit is only available through the Wells Fargo Mobile® app on eligible mobile devices, and deposit limits and other restrictions apply. Some accounts are not eligible for mobile deposit.

instruction: What banking features are available in the mobile app?
output: The Wells Fargo Mobile® app offers several key features: 1) Account management - monitor balances and transactions, set up account alerts, and open new accounts, 2) Money movement - send money with Zelle®, transfer money between accounts, and pay bills, 3) Mobile check deposit, and 4) Ask Fargo® - a virtual assistant to get quick answers to everyday banking questions.

instruction: How do I send money to someone using the app?
output: You can send money using Zelle® through the Wells Fargo Mobile® app. To use this service, you must first enroll with Zelle® through Wells Fargo Online® or Wells Fargo Business Online®. Both you and the recipient must have eligible checking or savings accounts. Transactions between enrolled users typically occur in minutes. For your protection, Zelle® should only be used for sending money to friends, family, or others you trust.

instruction: What is Ask Fargo and how do I use it?
output: Ask Fargo® is your virtual assistant available exclusively in the Wells Fargo Mobile® app. It helps you get quick answers to everyday banking questions. Ask Fargo® is only available on the smartphone versions of the Wells Fargo Mobile® app, and availability may be affected by your mobile carrier's coverage area.

instruction: Can I set up alerts for my account through the mobile app?
output: Yes, you can set up account alerts through the Wells Fargo Mobile® app as part of the account management features. Sign-up may be required, and availability may be affected by your mobile carrier's coverage area. Your mobile carrier's message and data rates may apply.

instruction: Are there any fees for using Zelle to send money?
output: While Zelle® itself doesn't charge fees for the service, account fees may apply to your Wells Fargo account when you use Zelle®. These can include monthly service fees, overdraft fees, or Small Business Account Analysis fees depending on your account type. Additionally, neither Wells Fargo nor Zelle® offers purchase protection for payments made with Zelle®.

instruction: How long do transfers to other banks take?
output: For transfers to other U.S. financial institutions, setup is required and verification may take 1–3 business days. You should refer to your other U.S. financial institutions for information about any potential fees they may charge. Terms and conditions apply, and your mobile carrier's message and data rates may apply.

instruction: What should I text to get the app download link?
output: Text 'IPH' for Apple devices or 'AND' for Android devices to 93557. You'll receive a one-time text message from Wells Fargo with a link to download the Wells Fargo Mobile® app. By texting, you agree to receive this one-time message. Message and data rates may apply, and availability may be affected by your mobile carrier's coverage area.

instruction: Are there any restrictions on mobile check deposits?
output: Yes, there are several restrictions on mobile check deposits: Mobile deposit is only available through the Wells Fargo Mobile® app on eligible mobile devices. Deposit limits and other restrictions apply, and some accounts are not eligible for mobile deposit. Availability may be affected by your mobile carrier's coverage area, and your mobile carrier's message and data rates may apply. Please refer to Wells Fargo's Online Access Agreement and your applicable business account fee disclosures for complete terms, conditions, and limitations.
